member.name: T:NewShore.APSP.Controller.IQuery
member.summary: Interface that define the methods that the APSP Controller should support.

member.name: M:NewShore.APSP.Controller.IQuery.getAllPersons
member.summary: This Method should provide a List of with list of the whole set of Persons (Villanos + Super Heroes)

member.name: M:NewShore.APSP.Controller.IQuery.getVillanos
member.summary: This Method should provide a List of with list of Villanos

member.name: M:NewShore.APSP.Controller.IQuery.getSuperHeroes
member.summary: This Method should provide a List of with list of SuperHeroes

member.name: M:NewShore.APSP.Controller.IQuery.saveVillanos
member.summary: This Method should save a list of Villanos in a File called "VILLANOS.DAT"
member.returns: The Method give back the value true if the file was saved successfully and fale in other case

member.name: M:NewShore.APSP.Controller.IQuery.saveSuperHeroes
member.summary: This Method should save a list of SuperHeroes in a File called "SUPERHEROES.DAT"
member.returns: The Method give back the value true if the file was saved successfully and fale in other case
